channel.title: Guides on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: Grant a Developer Access a WordPress Site or Site Bay Account
item.description: One of the most powerful features of Site Bay’s unmanaged service is the amount of control Site Bay users have over their account and the software installed on their systems.

item.title: How to Choose a Data Center
item.description: If your visitors are in North America choose Washington (state), otherwise choose EU (hosted in Frankfurt)

item.title: Resell Site Bay Services
item.description: Referral ProgramAs an alternative to reselling our services, you can participate in our referral program.

item.title: Network Transfer Usage and Costs
item.description: OverviewNetwork transfer is the exchange of data between two computers over the public internet or a private network.

item.title: Subscribe to Site Bay Status Updates
item.description: The Status Page provides real-time system status and maintenance updates via email. All customers are encouraged to subscribe to status notifications to stay up-to-date with any events that may impact our services.

item.title: Custom Domain Email on iMail Gmail for Free
item.description: Custom Domain Email on Gmail or iMailIn today’s digital world, having a custom email address with your own domain can boost your personal or business brand.

item.title: Help & Support
item.description: Site Bay provides a variety of support options so that you get the answers you need, in the timeframe you need them, and in the way that works best for you – all at no cost.
